data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g1WC8-FD_zoQ7kNvgGhwGsu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDeUqeICELXzqWew4VVFVqhVZHjHRj4ygo-oHejFCX8lA&oe=66656DCC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BSDX2fp18mIQ7kNvgH4OJRO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD6tGYaPwJOe1ADJXk7Dy-5hA2SpDcrHbE85dw673pMUA&oe=6665A41F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4ROqIhEyLZ0Q7kNvgHA0UG0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3ZL0WXGOxWJbqCL-C1N0v-IRh4fH5w7LwksT0IogiFg&oe=66658971)
